title: Optowatch for Watchmaker
summary: Optowatch Customizable Android Wear Watch Face Watchmaker for LG GWatchR Moto360
description: ***This watchface requires the latest Watchmaker  http://goo.gl/FMxUfY to make sure you can see all of the newest wmwatch features.***Features Include:⌚ (Tap the 12) - Switch between 12 colors⌚ (Tap the 9) - Switch between 7 fonts⌚ (Top Left Circle) - Left Widget⌚ (Top Right Circle) - Right Widget⌚ (Bottom Right Circle) - Flashlight⌚ (Heart between 6 and 9) - Heart Rate**Cleaned up UI to Optimze Speed**Watch the video to see it in action. Why have 1 watch face when you can have over 1000 different combinations?Watchmaker is an app that runs on your smart watch.Watchmaker is sold seperately.Compatible with Moto 360,LG Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, and any other Android Wear round face watches that are able to run watchmaker
descriptionHTML:
***This watchface requires the latest Watchmaker http://goo.gl/FMxUfY to make sure you can see all of the newest wmwatch features.***

Features Include:
⌚ (Tap the 12) - Switch between 12 colors
⌚ (Tap the 9) - Switch between 7 fonts
⌚ (Top Left Circle) - Left Widget
⌚ (Top Right Circle) - Right Widget
⌚ (Bottom Right Circle) - Flashlight
⌚ (Heart between 6 and 9) - Heart Rate
**Cleaned up UI to Optimze Speed**


Watch the video to see it in action.

Why have 1 watch face when you can have over 1000 different combinations?

Watchmaker is an app that runs on your smart watch.
Watchmaker is sold seperately.
Compatible with Moto 360,LG Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, and any other Android Wear round face watches that are able to run watchmaker
recentChanges: ⌚ Added a Date in Dimmed Mode (by request)
